{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Visonicom |model=VAC1203R |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FS |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores= |fla1=8 |ram1=128 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FS |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BR;RTL8812BRH; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=TR-069, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Wireless Dualband Gigabit Ethernet Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.visonicom.com/en/wireless-router-11ac-1200mbps-realtek-rtl8197fs-gigabit-vpn-iptv-tr069.html}} The product page says "64MB or 128MB 16-bit DDR2 SDRAM" ===See also=== *[[Visonicom VAC1203R]] - 11ac Wireless Router :1200Mbps, Dual Band ([[Realtek]] RTL8197FS) *[[Visonicom VAC1201M]] - 11ac Wireless Router :1200Mbps, Dual Band ([[MediaTek MT7621A]]) *[[Visonicom VAC751R]] - 11ac Wireless Router :750Mbps, Dual Band ([[Realtek]] RTL8881) *[[Visonicom VHR757Q]] - 11ac Wireless High Power Router :750Mbps, Dual Band ([[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531) *[[Visonicom VCP605Q]] - Ceiling 600Mbps Dual Band AP :PoE, Gigabit LAN, High Power 800mw ([[Atheros]] AR9344) *[[Visonicom VCP305Q]] - Ceiling Mounted AP PoE :2T2R 300Mbps, High Power 800mw ([[Atheros]] AR9341) *[[Visonicom VWN254R]] - Wireless 150Mbps Router :1T1R, IPTV, Support IPv6 ([[Realtek]] RTL8676S) *[[Visonicom VWN324R]] - Wireless 300Mbps Router :2T2R, Multi-SSID, IPTV Support ([[Realtek]] RTL8676S) *[[Visonicom VWN324RF]] - Wireless Fiber-optic Router :2T2R 300Mbps *[[Visonicom VHR303R]] - Wireless High Power Router :2T2R 300Mbps (Long Range 800mW) *[[Visonicom VRP303R]] - Wireless Repeater/Range Extender :2T2R 300Mbps ([[Realtek]] RTL8196E)
